question: I found out that after my third sugar test I failed this last one and now Dr says I have gestational diabetes. Already went through the emotional roller coaster with that today and have to prick my finger 2 hours after every meal.... Now have to fix my diet 27 weeks only gained 7lbs which about a month ago they yelled at me for gaining more weight now that I do I have gestational diabetes lovely
title: gestational diabetes
